name: guake-ssh
description: Systray menu to connect to SSH hosts configured in ~/.ssh/config and all files in ~/.ssh/config.d using Guake.
author: Paulo Ramalho <pramalho78@hotmail.com>

scripts.pack: mkdir -p dist && cp metadata.json dist/ && cp -r src/schemas/ dist/ && cp -r src/* dist/ && cd dist && zip ../${npm_package_name}.zip -9r .
scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm run pack && glib-compile-schemas ./dist/schemas && npm run install-extension
